terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Tirgus ("Platform"). By using our services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

platform.title: 1. What We Are
platform.content: Tirgus is a community connection platform that helps people find and offer help with everyday tasks. Think of us as a digital notice board or post office — we provide the space for people to connect, but we don't participate in or control the arrangements made between users.

noLiability.title: 2. Our Role & Limitations
noLiability.content: We are not a party to any agreement between users. All jobs, services, payments, and arrangements are made directly between the person posting a job and the person offering help. Tirgus does not:
list: Employ or contract any workers/helpers
Guarantee the quality, safety, or legality of any work performed
Handle payments or take commissions from transactions
Verify the skills or backgrounds of users
Take responsibility for disputes between users

userResponsibility.title: 3. Your Responsibilities
userResponsibility.content: By using Tirgus, you agree that you are solely responsible for:
list: The accuracy of information you post
Communicating clearly with other users
Agreeing on terms, payment, and expectations before starting work
Complying with all applicable laws and regulations
Your own safety when meeting or working with others
Resolving any disputes directly with the other party

age.title: 4. Age Requirement
age.content: You must be at least 16 years old to use Tirgus. By creating an account, you confirm that you meet this age requirement. Users under 18 should have parental or guardian consent.

noFees.title: 5. Free Platform
noFees.content: Tirgus is currently free to use. We do not charge fees or take commissions from any transactions between users. Any payments for jobs or services are arranged directly between users.

content.title: 6. User Content
content.content: You are responsible for all content you post on Tirgus. You agree not to post:
list: False, misleading, or fraudulent information
Illegal services or requests
Offensive, discriminatory, or harmful content
Spam or commercial advertising unrelated to tasks/services
content.removal: We reserve the right to remove any content and suspend accounts that violate these terms.

safety.title: 7. Safety Guidelines
safety.content: While we want everyone to have positive experiences, please use common sense and caution:
list: Meet in public places when possible for initial meetings
Tell someone where you're going
Trust your instincts — if something feels wrong, leave
Don't share sensitive personal information unnecessarily
Report suspicious behavior to us

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: THE PLATFORM IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE CONTINUOUS, UNINTERRUPTED ACCESS TO OUR SERVICES. TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, TIRGUS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE PLATFORM.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us at:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy matters to us. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data.

collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide directly:
list: Account information: name, email, phone number, profile picture
Profile details: bio, location (city/country), skills
Content you create: job posts, service offerings, messages, reviews
Location data: approximate location to show nearby jobs/services (only when you permit)
collect.automatic: We also collect some information automatically:

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
list: Provide and improve our services
Connect you with relevant jobs and helpers in your area
Enable communication between users
Send important updates about your account or transactions
Ensure platform safety and prevent fraud
Analyze usage to improve the platform

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do NOT sell your personal data. We may share information:
list: With other users: Your public profile, job posts, and offerings are visible to others
With service providers: Companies that help us operate (hosting, analytics) under strict confidentiality
For legal reasons: If required by law or to protect rights and safety

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and access controls. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
list: Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate information
Delete your account and associated data
Export your data
Opt out of marketing communications
rights.howTo: To exercise these rights, go to your Profile settings or contact us.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to make the platform work properly (login sessions, preferences). We may use analytics cookies to understand how people use Tirgus. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We keep your data while your account is active. If you delete your account, we will remove your personal data within 30 days, except where we need to keep it for legal reasons.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Tirgus is not intended for users under 16. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 16. If we learn we have collected such data, we will delete it promptly.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy. We'll notify you of significant changes through the platform or email.
